short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Enable real-time collaborative screen-sharing with Avaya Conferencing
short.de: Aktivieren Sie Echtzeit-Collaborative-Screen-Sharing mit Avaya Conferencing
short.es: Habilitar el compartir colaborativo en tiempo real con Avaya Conferencing
short.fr: Activer le partage collaboratif en temps réel avec Avaya Conferencing
short.it: Attiva la condivisione dello schermo in tempo reale con Avaya Conferencing
short.ja: Avaya Conferencingとのリアルタイムのコラボレーション画面共有を実現
short.ko: Avaya 컨퍼런싱을 통한 실시간 협업 화면 공유 사용
short.nl: Schakel in real-time samenwerkend scherm delen in met Avaya Conferencing
short.pt_BR: Permitir compartilhamento de tela colaborativo em tempo real com o Avaya Conferencing
short.ru: Включить совместное использование экрана в режиме реального времени с помощью Avaya Conferencing
short.zh_CN: 启用与Avaya会议的实时协作屏幕共享

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Avaya Screen Sharing lets you share selected apps, your screen, or a portion of your screen with other participants in an Avaya Conferencing based meeting.

Avaya Screen Sharing can:
-	Read and change your data on all Avaya Conferencing hosted meetings
-	Capture content of your screen
